text: Richard "Richie" Tozier is a fictional character from the It novel. He also appears in 1990 miniseries, Woh, and the theatrical film series. He is a stand-up comedian in the It miniseries and film. He's a disc-jockey in the 1998 TV series. ==Appearances== *1990 TV miniseries *1998 television series *2017 film and 2019 sequel ==Other websites== * Category:Fictional people
title: Richie Tozier
